title: Certified Tester Foundation Level in Software Testing
description: aimed at professionals who need to demonstrate practical knowledge of the fundamental concepts of software testing
target: - testers- test analysts- test engineers- test consultants- test managers- user acceptance testers- software developers
requirements: - at least six months practical experience in a professional testing role
subjects: - Fundamentals of Testing- Testing throughout the software life cycle- Static techniques- Test design techniques- Test Management- Tool Support for Testing
